name: Path to Redemption
description:
Path to Redemption is a 3D platformer about sacrifice. Run to the sacrificial alters and fling yourself into the pits to redeem your life.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Left Shift to crouch

Made for Ludum Dare 43 by:

Riley Moeller

Matthew Davies

Petter Sovik

Special thanks to Will Howard for creating the music!
